channel.title: View shop

item.title: View shop
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

} else if (!inWild() && !inDuelArena() && safeTimer <= 0 && !inGWD()
				&& !inPcBoat() && !inPcGame() && !isInRave() && !inCw() && !inClanWar() && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 11951) {
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "View shop", 1);
			getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
		} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11951) {
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Throw at", 1);
			getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
		} else if (!inWild() && safeTimer > 0) {
			getPA().walkableInterface(197);
			wildLevel = (60);
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
			getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@" + safeTimer, 199);

I’m trying to make the throw-at option appear for when wielding a snow ball, it appears but nothing happens, now nothing happens when you click view shop either, Any idea what i’m doing wrong?

Read full topic
